<ENVELOPE>
    <HEADER>
      <TALLYREQUEST>Import Data</TALLYREQUEST>
    </HEADER>
    <BODY>
      <IMPORTDATA>
        <REQUESTDESC>
          <REPORTNAME>Vouchers</REPORTNAME>
        <STATICVARIABLES>
          <SVCURRENTCOMPANY>Delhi-Lucid</SVCURRENTCOMPANY>
        </STATICVARIABLES>
        </REQUESTDESC>

          <TALLYMESSAGE xmlns:UDF="TallyUDF">
            <VOUCHER>
              <DATE>18-Aug-2025</DATE>
              <VOUCHERTYPENAME>Sales Order</VOUCHERTYPENAME>
              <PARTYNAME>1 New Customer</PARTYNAME>
              <PARTYLEDGERNAME>1 New Customer</PARTYLEDGERNAME>
              <REFERENCE>ORD-1755500205247-299</REFERENCE>

              <ADDRESS.LIST TYPE="String">
                <ADDRESS></ADDRESS>
                <ADDRESS></ADDRESS>
                <ADDRESS></ADDRESS>
              </ADDRESS.LIST>
              <BASICBUYERADDRESS.LIST TYPE="String">
                <BASICBUYERADDRESS></BASICBUYERADDRESS>
                <BASICBUYERADDRESS></BASICBUYERADDRESS>
                <BASICBUYERADDRESS></BASICBUYERADDRESS>
              </BASICBUYERADDRESS.LIST>
              <CONSIGNEEGSTIN></CONSIGNEEGSTIN>
              
    <ALLINVENTORYENTRIES.LIST>
      <STOCKITEMNAME>Badam Drink Mix 100g</STOCKITEMNAME>
      <ISDEEMEDPOSITIVE>Yes</ISDEEMEDPOSITIVE>
      <RATE>120</RATE>
      <AMOUNT>-120.00</AMOUNT>
      <ACTUALQTY>1</ACTUALQTY>
      <BILLEDQTY>1</BILLEDQTY>
      <BATCHALLOCATIONS.LIST>
                    <GODOWNNAME> Any</GODOWNNAME>
                    <BATCHNAME> Any</BATCHNAME>
                    <ORDERNO>ORD-1755500205247-299</ORDERNO>
                    <TRACKINGNUMBER> Not Applicable</TRACKINGNUMBER>
                    <ACTUALQTY>1</ACTUALQTY>
                    <BILLEDQTY>1</BILLEDQTY>
                    <AMOUNT>-120</AMOUNT>
                    <ORDERDUEDATE>01-08-2025</ORDERDUEDATE>
                    <MFGDT></MFGDT>
                    <EXPDT></EXPDT>
                </BATCHALLOCATIONS.LIST>
    </ALLINVENTORYENTRIES.LIST>
  
              <LEDGERENTRIES.LIST>
                <LEDGERNAME>1 New Customer</LEDGERNAME>
                <ISDEEMEDPOSITIVE>Yes</ISDEEMEDPOSITIVE>
                <AMOUNT>-120.00</AMOUNT>
              </LEDGERENTRIES.LIST>
            </VOUCHER>
          </TALLYMESSAGE>
        </REQUESTDATA>
      </IMPORTDATA>
    </BODY>
  </ENVELOPE>

<ENVELOPE>
    <HEADER>
        <VERSION>1</VERSION>
        <TALLYREQUEST>IMPORT</TALLYREQUEST>
        <TYPE>DATA</TYPE>
        <ID>Vouchers</ID>
    </HEADER>
    <BODY>
        <DESC>
            <STATICVARIABLES>
                <SVCURRENTCOMPANY>Delhi - Lucid</SVCURRENTCOMPANY>
            </STATICVARIABLES>
        </DESC>
    </BODY>
    <TALLYMESSAGE>

            <LANGUAGEID> 1033</LANGUAGEID>

    </TALLYMESSAGE>

</ENVELOPE>

<ENVELOPE>
	<HEADER>
		<VERSION>1</VERSION>
		<TALLYREQUEST>Export</TALLYREQUEST>
		<TYPE>Data</TYPE>
		<ID>VOUCHER</ID>
	</HEADER>
	<BODY>
		<DESC>
			<STATICVARIABLES>
				<EXPORTFLAG>YES</EXPORTFLAG>
				<SVEXPORTFORMAT>$$SysName:XML</SVEXPORTFORMAT>
				<SVCURRENTCOMPANY>Delhi-Lucid</SVCURRENTCOMPANY>
			</STATICVARIABLES>
			<TDL>
				<TDLMESSAGE>
					<REPORT NAME="CP_Voucher" ISMODIFY="No" ISFIXED="No" ISINITIALIZE="No" ISOPTION="No" ISINTERNAL="No">
                        <USE>VOUCHER</USE>
                        <USE>Printed Invoice</USE>
                        <FORMS>VOUCHER</FORMS>
                        <OBJECTS>Voucher : $$Sprintf:@@VchMasterid:303</OBJECTS>
                        <SET>VARVchDate : "20250801"</SET>
                        <SET>vResetOverriddenFlags : Yes</SET>
                        <SET>vResetIgnoreGSTIN  : Yes</SET>
                        <SET>SVVoucherType  : Sales Order</SET>
                    </REPORT>
				</TDLMESSAGE>
			</TDL>
		</DESC>
	</BODY>
</ENVELOPE>

<ENVELOPE>
 	<HEADER>
    		<VERSION>1</VERSION>
    		<TALLYREQUEST>Export</TALLYREQUEST>
    		<TYPE>Collection</TYPE>
    		<ID>ITCVoucherCollTest</ID>
 	</HEADER>
<BODY>
<DESC>
<TDL>
<TDLMESSAGE>
<COLLECTION NAME="ITCVoucherCollTest" ISMODIFY="No" ISFIXED="No" ISINITIALIZE="No" ISOPTION="No" ISINTERNAL="No">
  <TYPE>VOUCHER</TYPE> 
  <NATIVEMETHOD>MASTERID, VOUCHERTYPENAME, VOUCHERNUMBER, PARTYLEDGERNAME, ISOPTIONAL, AMOUNT</NATIVEMETHOD>
  </COLLECTION>
  </TDLMESSAGE>
  </TDL>
</DESC>
</BODY>
</ENVELOPE>

<ENVELOPE>
    <HEADER>
        <VERSION>1</VERSION>
        <TALLYREQUEST>IMPORT</TALLYREQUEST>
        <TYPE>DATA</TYPE>
        <ID>Vouchers</ID>
    </HEADER>

        <DESC>
            <STATICVARIABLES>

            </STATICVARIABLES>
        </DESC>
        <DATA>

                <VOUCHER REMOTEID="Transaction UniqueID">

<ENVELOPE>
<HEADER>
<VERSION>1</VERSION>
<TALLYREQUEST>Export</TALLYREQUEST>
<TYPE>Data</TYPE>
<ID>ODBC Report</ID>
</HEADER>
<BODY>
<DESC>
<TDL>  
<TDLMESSAGE>
<COLLECTION NAME="CP_Stockitem Coll">
                        <TYPE>STOCKITEM</TYPE>
                        <FILTERS>CP_RemvEmptyUOM</FILTERS>
                    </COLLECTION>
                    <SYSTEM TYPE="Formulae" NAME="CP_RemvEmptyUOM">NOT $$IsSysName:$BASEUNITS</SYSTEM>
                    </TDLMESSAGE>
</TDL>
<SQLREQUEST TYPE="Prepare" METHOD="SQLPrepare">SELECT $MASTERID AS MASTERID, $NAME AS NAME, $PARTNO AS PARTNO, $BASEUNITS AS BASEUNITS, $GSTHSNCode AS HSNCODE, $GSTIGSTRate AS IGST, $StandardPrice AS STDPRICE, $LastSalePrice AS LASTPRICE, $$FromValue:"":$$ToValue:##VARVchDate:$$Number:$CLOSINGBALANCE AS CLOSINGSTOCK,  $IsBatchWiseOn AS ISBATCHWISEON, $HasMfgDate AS HASMFGDATE, $IsPerishableOn AS HASEXPDATE from CP_StockitemColl</SQLREQUEST>
<STATICVARIABLES>
<EXPLODEFLAG>Yes</EXPLODEFLAG>
<SVEXPORTFORMAT>$$SysName:XML</SVEXPORTFORMAT>
<SVCURRENTCOMPANY>${escapedCompany}</SVCURRENTCOMPANY>
</STATICVARIABLES>
</DESC>
</BODY>
</ENVELOPE>

<ENVELOPE>
	<HEADER>
		<VERSION>1</VERSION>
		<TALLYREQUEST>Export</TALLYREQUEST>
		<TYPE>Data</TYPE>
		<ID>CP_LedGroup</ID>
	</HEADER>
	<BODY>
		<DESC>
			<STATICVARIABLES>
				<EXPORTFLAG>YES</EXPORTFLAG>
				<SVEXPORTFORMAT>$$SysName:XML</SVEXPORTFORMAT>
                <SVCURRENTCOMPANY>${escapedCompany}</SVCURRENTCOMPANY>
			</STATICVARIABLES>
			<TDL>
				<TDLMESSAGE>
					<REPORT NAME="CP_LedGroup">
						<FORMS>CP_LedGroup</FORMS>
					</REPORT>
					<FORM NAME="CP_LedGroup">
						<TOPPARTS>CP_LedGroup</TOPPARTS>
					</FORM>
					<PART NAME="CP_LedGroup">
						<TOPLINES>CP_LedGroup</TOPLINES>
						<REPEAT>CP_LedGroup : CP_LedGroup Coll</REPEAT>
						<SCROLLED>Vertical</SCROLLED>
					</PART>
					<LINE NAME="CP_LedGroup">
						<LEFTFIELDS>CP_Temp1, CP_Temp2</LEFTFIELDS>
						<LOCAL>Field : CP_Temp1  : Set as : $NAME</LOCAL>
						<LOCAL>Field : CP_Temp2  : Set as : $MASTERID</LOCAL>

						<LOCAL>Field : CP_Temp1  : Xml Tag : "NAME"</LOCAL>
						<LOCAL>Field : CP_Temp2  : Xml Tag : "MASTERID"</LOCAL>

                        <XMLTAG>"groups"</XMLTAG>
					</LINE>
					<FIELD NAME="CP_Temp1">   </FIELD>
					<FIELD NAME="CP_Temp2">   </FIELD>
					<COLLECTION NAME="CP_LedGroup Coll">
						<COLLECTIONS>CP_LedGroup DrsColl, CP_LedGroup CrsColl, CP_LedGroup BrnchColl</COLLECTIONS>
						<SORT>Default : $NAME</SORT>
					</COLLECTION>
					<COLLECTION NAME="CP_LedGroup DrsColl" ISMODIFY="No" ISFIXED="No" ISINITIALIZE="No" ISOPTION="No" ISINTERNAL="No">
						<TYPE>GROUP</TYPE>
						<CHILDOF>$$GroupSundryDebtors</CHILDOF>
						<BELONGSTO>Yes</BELONGSTO>
					</COLLECTION>
					<COLLECTION NAME="CP_LedGroup CrsColl" ISMODIFY="No" ISFIXED="No" ISINITIALIZE="No" ISOPTION="No" ISINTERNAL="No">
						<TYPE>GROUP</TYPE>
						<CHILDOF>$$GroupSundryCreditors</CHILDOF>
						<BELONGSTO>Yes</BELONGSTO>
					</COLLECTION>
					<COLLECTION NAME="CP_LedGroup BrnchColl" ISMODIFY="No" ISFIXED="No" ISINITIALIZE="No" ISOPTION="No" ISINTERNAL="No">
						<TYPE>GROUP</TYPE>
						<CHILDOF>$$GroupBranches</CHILDOF>
						<BELONGSTO>Yes</BELONGSTO>
					</COLLECTION>
				</TDLMESSAGE>
			</TDL>
		</DESC>
	</BODY>
</ENVELOPE>

<ENVELOPE>
	<HEADER>
		<VERSION>1</VERSION>
		<TALLYREQUEST>Export</TALLYREQUEST>
		<TYPE>Data</TYPE>
		<ID>CP_GodownClsStck</ID>
	</HEADER>
	<BODY>
		<DESC>
			<STATICVARIABLES>
				<EXPORTFLAG>YES</EXPORTFLAG>
				<SVEXPORTFORMAT>$$SysName:XML</SVEXPORTFORMAT>
                <SVCURRENTCOMPANY>${escapedCompany}</SVCURRENTCOMPANY>
			</STATICVARIABLES>
			<TDL>
				<TDLMESSAGE>
					<REPORT NAME="CP_GodownClsStck">
						<FORMS>CP_GodownClsStck</FORMS>
					</REPORT>
					<FORM NAME="CP_GodownClsStck">
						<TOPPARTS>CP_GodownClsStck</TOPPARTS>
					</FORM>
					<PART NAME="CP_GodownClsStck">
						<TOPLINES>CP_GodownClsStck</TOPLINES>
						<REPEAT>CP_GodownClsStck : CP_GodownClsStck Coll</REPEAT>
						<SCROLLED>Vertical</SCROLLED>
					</PART>
					<LINE NAME="CP_GodownClsStck">
						<LEFTFIELDS>CP_Temp1, CP_Temp2</LEFTFIELDS>
						<LOCAL>Field : CP_Temp1  : Set as : $NAME</LOCAL>
						<LOCAL>Field : CP_Temp2  : Set as : $$ToValue:"01-Sep-25":$$Number:$$GodownItemValue:$NAME:"Item C":$ClosingBalance</LOCAL>

						<LOCAL>Field : CP_Temp1  : Xml Tag : "NAME"</LOCAL>
						<LOCAL>Field : CP_Temp2  : Xml Tag : "CLOSINGSTOCK"</LOCAL>

                        <XMLTAG>"godown"</XMLTAG>
					</LINE>
					<FIELD NAME="CP_Temp1">   </FIELD>
					<FIELD NAME="CP_Temp2">   </FIELD>
					<COLLECTION NAME="CP_GodownClsStck Coll" ISMODIFY="No" ISFIXED="No" ISINITIALIZE="No" ISOPTION="No" ISINTERNAL="No">
						<TYPE>GODOWN</TYPE>
					</COLLECTION>
				</TDLMESSAGE>
			</TDL>
		</DESC>
	</BODY>
</ENVELOPE>

<ENVELOPE>
	<HEADER>
		<VERSION>1</VERSION>
		<TALLYREQUEST>Export</TALLYREQUEST>
		<TYPE>Data</TYPE>
		<ID>CP_CompanyClsStck</ID>
	</HEADER>
	<BODY>
		<DESC>
			<STATICVARIABLES>
				<EXPORTFLAG>YES</EXPORTFLAG>
				<SVEXPORTFORMAT>$$SysName:XML</SVEXPORTFORMAT>
			</STATICVARIABLES>
			<TDL>
				<TDLMESSAGE>
					<REPORT NAME="CP_CompanyClsStck">
						<FORMS>CP_CompanyClsStck</FORMS>
					</REPORT>
					<FORM NAME="CP_CompanyClsStck">
						<TOPPARTS>CP_CompanyClsStck</TOPPARTS>
					</FORM>
					<PART NAME="CP_CompanyClsStck">
						<TOPLINES>CP_CompanyClsStck</TOPLINES>
						<REPEAT>CP_CompanyClsStck : CP_CompanyClsStck Coll</REPEAT>
						<SCROLLED>Vertical</SCROLLED>
					</PART>
					<LINE NAME="CP_CompanyClsStck">
						<LEFTFIELDS>CP_Temp1, CP_Temp2</LEFTFIELDS>
						<LOCAL>Field : CP_Temp1  : Set as : $NAME</LOCAL>
						<LOCAL>Field : CP_Temp2  : Set as : $$CompanyValue:$NAME:$$ToValue:"01-Sep-25":$$Number:$ClosingBalance:STOCKITEM:"Item C"</LOCAL>

						<LOCAL>Field : CP_Temp1  : Xml Tag : "NAME"</LOCAL>
						<LOCAL>Field : CP_Temp2  : Xml Tag : "CLOSINGSTOCK"</LOCAL>

                        <XMLTAG>"companystck"</XMLTAG>
					</LINE>
					<FIELD NAME="CP_Temp1">   </FIELD>
					<FIELD NAME="CP_Temp2">   </FIELD>
					<COLLECTION NAME="CP_CompanyClsStck Coll" ISMODIFY="No" ISFIXED="No" ISINITIALIZE="No" ISOPTION="No" ISINTERNAL="No">
						<TYPE>COMPANY</TYPE>
                        <FILTERS>CP_RequCompany</FILTERS>
					</COLLECTION>
                    <SYSTEM TYPE="Formulae" NAME="CP_RequCompany">$NAME = "Delhi - Lucid"</SYSTEM>
				</TDLMESSAGE>
			</TDL>
		</DESC>
	</BODY>
</ENVELOPE>

<ENVELOPE>
	<HEADER>
		<VERSION>1</VERSION>
		<TALLYREQUEST>Export</TALLYREQUEST>
		<TYPE>Data</TYPE>
		<ID>ODBC Report</ID>
	</HEADER>
	<BODY>
		<DESC>
			<STATICVARIABLES>
				<EXPORTFLAG>YES</EXPORTFLAG>
				<SVEXPORTFORMAT>$$SysName:XML</SVEXPORTFORMAT>
				<SVCURRENTCOMPANY>${escapedCompany}</SVCURRENTCOMPANY>
			</STATICVARIABLES>
			<TDL>
				<TDLMESSAGE>
					<REPORT NAME="ODBC Report" ISMODIFY="Yes" ISFIXED="No" ISINITIALIZE="No" ISOPTION="No" ISINTERNAL="No">
						<Add>Variable : SVFromDate, SVToDate</Add>
						<Set>SVFromdate : "01-Sep-25"</Set>
						<Set>SVTodate : "01-Sep-25"</Set>
					</REPORT>
					<COLLECTION NAME="CP_VoucherData Coll" ISMODIFY="No" ISFIXED="No" ISINITIALIZE="No" ISOPTION="No" ISINTERNAL="No">
						<SourceCollection>CP_VoucherData SColl, CP_VoucherData SRColl</SourceCollection>
						<Walk>ALLINVENTORYENTRIES</Walk>
						<NativeMethod>STOCKITEMNAME</NativeMethod>
						<Method>CP_MasterID : $..MASTERID</Method>
						<Method>CP_VchType : $..VOUCHERTYPENAME</Method>
						<Method>CP_isSales : $$IsSales:$..VOUCHERTYPENAME</Method>
						<Method>CP_Date  : $..DATE</Method>
						<Method>CP_VchNo  : $..VoucherNumber</Method>
						<Method>CP_Customer : $..PARTYLEDGERNAME</Method>
						<Method>CP_CGroup  : $..CP_LedGroup</Method>
						<Method>CP_CGrpofGrp : $PARENT:GROUP:$..CP_LedGroup</Method>
						<Method>CP_State  : $..STATENAME</Method>
						<Method>CP_Country : $..COUNTRYOFRESIDENCE</Method>
						<Method>CP_GstNo  : $..PARTYGSTIN</Method>
						<Method>CP_Pincode : $..PARTYPINCODE</Method>
						<Method>CP_InvVale : $..CP_InvValue</Method>
						<Method>CP_CostCenter : $..COSTCENTRENAME</Method>
						<Method>CP_Stockitem : $STOCKITEMNAME</Method>
						<Method>CP_SGroup  : $PARENT:STOCKITEM:$STOCKITEMNAME</Method>
						<Method>CP_SGrpofGrp : $PARENT:STOCKGROUP:$PARENT:STOCKITEM:$STOCKITEMNAME</Method>
						<Method>CP_SCategory : $CATEGORY:STOCKITEM:$STOCKITEMNAME</Method>
						<Method>CP_SCatgofCat : $PARENT:STOCKCATEGORY:$CATEGORY:STOCKITEM:$STOCKITEMNAME</Method>
						<Method>CP_UOM  : $BASEUNITS:STOCKITEM:$STOCKITEMNAME</Method>
						<Method>CP_BILLEDQTY : IF $$IsSales:$..VOUCHERTYPENAME THEN $$Number:$BILLEDQTY ELSE $$Number:$BILLEDQTY * -1</Method>
						<Method>CP_Rate  : $$Number:$RATE</Method>
						<Method>CP_AMOUNT  : IF $$IsSales:$..VOUCHERTYPENAME THEN $$Number:$AMOUNT ELSE $$Number:$AMOUNT * -1</Method>
						<Filters>CP_isReqStckGroup, CP_isReqStckCatg</Filters>
					</COLLECTION>
					<COLLECTION NAME="CP_VoucherData SColl" ISMODIFY="No" ISFIXED="No" ISINITIALIZE="No" ISOPTION="No" ISINTERNAL="No">
						<Type>VOUCHERS : VOUCHERTYPE</Type>
						<ChildOf>$$VchTypeSales</ChildOf>
						<BelongsTo>Yes</BelongsTo>
						<Filters>NotIsOptionalOrCancel</Filters>
						<NativeMethod>*, AMOUNT</NativeMethod>
						<Method>CP_InvValue : $$Number:$AMOUNT</Method>
						<Method>CP_LedGroup : $PARENT:LEDGER:$PARTYLEDGERNAME</Method>
						<Filters>CP_isReqGroup, CP_isSameMailid</Filters>
					</COLLECTION>
					<COLLECTION NAME="CP_VoucherData SRColl" ISMODIFY="No" ISFIXED="No" ISINITIALIZE="No" ISOPTION="No" ISINTERNAL="No">
						<Type>VOUCHERS : VOUCHERTYPE</Type>
						<ChildOf>$$VchTypeCreditNote</ChildOf>
						<BelongsTo>Yes</BelongsTo>
						<Filters>NotIsOptionalOrCancel</Filters>
						<NativeMethod>*, AMOUNT</NativeMethod>
						<Method>CP_InvValue : $$Number:$AMOUNT * -1</Method>
						<Method>CP_LedGroup : $PARENT:LEDGER:$PARTYLEDGERNAME</Method>
						<Filters>CP_isReqGroup, CP_isSameMailid</Filters>
					</COLLECTION>
					<SYSTEM TYPE="Formulae" NAME="CP_isReqGroup" ISMODIFY="No" ISFIXED="No" ISINTERNAL="No">$$IsLedOfGrp:$PARTYLEDGERNAME:"Sundry Debtors"   </SYSTEM>
					<SYSTEM TYPE="Formulae" NAME="CP_isSameMailid" ISMODIFY="No" ISFIXED="No" ISINTERNAL="No">$EMAIL:LEDGER:$PARTYLEDGERNAME Contains "rohit@itcatalystindia.com" OR $EMAILCC:LEDGER:$PARTYLEDGERNAME Contains "rohit@itcatalystindia.com"   </SYSTEM>
					<SYSTEM TYPE="Formulae" NAME="CP_isReqStckGroup" ISMODIFY="No" ISFIXED="No" ISINTERNAL="No">$$IsObjectBelongsTo:STOCKGROUP:($PARENT:STOCKITEM:$STOCKITEMNAME):"Group A"   </SYSTEM>
					<SYSTEM TYPE="Formulae" NAME="CP_isReqStckCatg" ISMODIFY="No" ISFIXED="No" ISINTERNAL="No">$$IsObjectBelongsTo:STOCKCATEGORY:($CATEGORY:STOCKITEM:$STOCKITEMNAME):"Categroy 1"   </SYSTEM>
				</TDLMESSAGE>
			</TDL>
			<SQLREQUEST TYPE="Prepare" METHOD="SQLPrepare">Select $CP_MasterID, $CP_VchType, $CP_isSales, $CP_Date, $CP_VchNo, $CP_Customer, $CP_CGroup, $CP_CGrpofGrp, $CP_State, $CP_Country, $CP_GstNo, $CP_Pincode, $CP_InvVale, $CP_CostCenter, $CP_Stockitem, $CP_SGroup, $CP_SGrpofGrp, $CP_SCategory, $CP_SCatgofCat, $CP_UOM, $CP_BILLEDQTY, $CP_Rate, $CP_AMOUNT from CP_VoucherDataColl</SQLREQUEST>
			<STATICVARIABLES>
				<SVEXPORTFORMAT>$$SysName:XML</SVEXPORTFORMAT>
			</STATICVARIABLES>
		</DESC>
	</BODY>
</ENVELOPE>

<ENVELOPE>
	<HEADER>
		<VERSION>1</VERSION>
		<TALLYREQUEST>Export</TALLYREQUEST>
		<TYPE>Data</TYPE>
		<ID>ODBC Report</ID>
	</HEADER>
	<BODY>
		<DESC>
			<TDL>
				<TDLMESSAGE>
					<COLLECTION NAME="CP_Ledgers DrsColl" ISMODIFY="No" ISFIXED="No" ISINITIALIZE="No" ISOPTION="No" ISINTERNAL="No">
						<TYPE>LEDGER</TYPE>
						<CHILDOF>$$GroupSundryDebtors</CHILDOF>
						<BELONGSTO>Yes</BELONGSTO>
						<NATIVEMETHOD>NAME, INCOMETAXNUMBER, PARTYGSTIN, LEDGSTREGDETAILS.*</NATIVEMETHOD>
					</COLLECTION>
					<COLLECTION NAME="CP_Ledgers CrsColl" ISMODIFY="No" ISFIXED="No" ISINITIALIZE="No" ISOPTION="No" ISINTERNAL="No">
						<TYPE>LEDGER</TYPE>
						<CHILDOF>$$GroupSundryCreditors</CHILDOF>
						<BELONGSTO>Yes</BELONGSTO>
						<NATIVEMETHOD>NAME, INCOMETAXNUMBER, PARTYGSTIN, LEDGSTREGDETAILS.*</NATIVEMETHOD>
					</COLLECTION>
					<COLLECTION NAME="CP_Ledgers SusColl" ISMODIFY="No" ISFIXED="No" ISINITIALIZE="No" ISOPTION="No" ISINTERNAL="No">
						<TYPE>LEDGER</TYPE>
						<CHILDOF>$$GroupSuspense</CHILDOF>
						<BELONGSTO>Yes</BELONGSTO>
						<NATIVEMETHOD>NAME, INCOMETAXNUMBER, PARTYGSTIN, LEDGSTREGDETAILS.*</NATIVEMETHOD>
					</COLLECTION>
					<COLLECTION NAME="CP_Ledgers BranchColl" ISMODIFY="No" ISFIXED="No" ISINITIALIZE="No" ISOPTION="No" ISINTERNAL="No">
						<TYPE>LEDGER</TYPE>
						<CHILDOF>$$GroupBranches</CHILDOF>
						<BELONGSTO>Yes</BELONGSTO>
						<NATIVEMETHOD>NAME, INCOMETAXNUMBER, PARTYGSTIN, LEDGSTREGDETAILS.*</NATIVEMETHOD>
					</COLLECTION>
					<COLLECTION NAME="CP_Ledgers" ISMODIFY="No" ISFIXED="No" ISINITIALIZE="No" ISOPTION="No" ISINTERNAL="No">
						<COLLECTIONS>CP_Ledgers DrsColl, CP_Ledgers CrsColl</COLLECTIONS>
						<COLLECTIONS>CP_Ledgers SusColl, CP_Ledgers BranchColl</COLLECTIONS>
					</COLLECTION>
					<SYSTEM TYPE="Formulae" NAME="CP_tallyRel3_0" ISMODIFY="No" ISFIXED="No" ISINTERNAL="No">(@@LatestRelasStr Starting With "TallyPrime" OR @@LatestRelasStr Starting With "Tally Prime") AND $$Number:$$ProdInfo:ProdReleaseAsStr >= $$Number:3   </SYSTEM>
					<SYSTEM TYPE="Formulae" NAME="CP_GSTINNO" ISMODIFY="No" ISFIXED="No" ISINTERNAL="No">IF @@CP_tallyRel3_0 THEN $LEDGSTREGDETAILS[-1].GSTIN ELSE $PARTYGSTIN   </SYSTEM>
					<SYSTEM TYPE="Formulae" NAME="CP_isNameChck" ISMODIFY="No" ISFIXED="No" ISINTERNAL="No">$NAME = ""   </SYSTEM>
					<SYSTEM TYPE="Formulae" NAME="CP_isPanChck" ISMODIFY="No" ISFIXED="No" ISINTERNAL="No">$INCOMETAXNUMBER = ""   </SYSTEM>
					<SYSTEM TYPE="Formulae" NAME="CP_isGstinChck" ISMODIFY="No" ISFIXED="No" ISINTERNAL="No">@@CP_GSTINNO = ""   </SYSTEM>
				</TDLMESSAGE>
			</TDL>
			<SQLREQUEST TYPE="Prepare" METHOD="SQLPrepare">SELECT $$Numitems:CP_Ledgers AS COUNT from Company</SQLREQUEST>
			<STATICVARIABLES>
				<EXPLODEFLAG>Yes</EXPLODEFLAG>
				<SVEXPORTFORMAT>$$SysName:XML</SVEXPORTFORMAT>
				<SVCURRENTCOMPANY>${escapedCompany}</SVCURRENTCOMPANY>
			</STATICVARIABLES>
		</DESC>
	</BODY>
</ENVELOPE>

</ENVELOPE>

<ENVELOPE>
	<HEADER>
		<VERSION>1</VERSION>
		<TALLYREQUEST>Export</TALLYREQUEST>
		<TYPE>Data</TYPE>
		<ID>ODBC Report</ID>
	</HEADER>
	<BODY>
		<DESC>
			<STATICVARIABLES>
				<EXPORTFLAG>YES</EXPORTFLAG>
				<SVEXPORTFORMAT>$$SysName:XML</SVEXPORTFORMAT>
				<SVCURRENTCOMPANY>${escapedCompany}</SVCURRENTCOMPANY>
			</STATICVARIABLES>
			<TDL>
				<TDLMESSAGE>
					<REPORT NAME="ODBC Report" ISMODIFY="Yes" ISFIXED="No" ISINITIALIZE="No" ISOPTION="No" ISINTERNAL="No">
						<Add>Variable : SVFromDate, SVToDate</Add>
						<Set>SVFromdate : "${tallyFromDate}"</Set>
						<Set>SVTodate : "${tallyToDate}"</Set>
					</REPORT>
					<COLLECTION NAME="CP BatchStock Coll" ISMODIFY="No" ISFIXED="No" ISINITIALIZE="No" ISOPTION="No" ISINTERNAL="No">
    <Type>Batches in Godown</Type>
    <ChildOf>$NAME</ChildOf>
    <NativeMethod>NAME, PARENT, CLOSINGBALANCE, CLOSINGVALUE</NativeMethod>
    <NativeMethod>MfdOn, ExpiryPeriod</NativeMethod>
    <Method>CPGODOWN : $$LoopCollObj:$Name</Method>
    <Filters>CP isSameStck</Filters>
   </COLLECTION>
   <COLLECTION NAME="CP GodownList" ISMODIFY="No" ISFIXED="No" ISINITIALIZE="No" ISOPTION="No" ISINTERNAL="No">
    <Type>GODOWN</Type>
    <NativeMethod>NAME</NativeMethod>
   </COLLECTION>
   <COLLECTION NAME="CP GodownStock Coll" ISMODIFY="No" ISFIXED="No" ISINITIALIZE="No" ISOPTION="No" ISINTERNAL="No">
    <Collections>CP BatchStock Coll : CP GodownList</Collections>
    <NativeMethod>NAME, PARENT, CLOSINGBALANCE, CLOSINGVALUE, CPGODOWN</NativeMethod>
    <NativeMethod>MfdOn, ExpiryPeriod</NativeMethod>
    <Sort>Default : $PARENT, $ITCGODOWN, $NAME</Sort>
   </COLLECTION>
   <SYSTEM TYPE="Formulae" NAME="CP isSameStck" ISMODIFY="No" ISFIXED="No" ISINTERNAL="No">$PARENT = $NAME:STOCKITEM:"HIHG5069"   </SYSTEM>

				</TDLMESSAGE>
			</TDL>
			<SQLREQUEST TYPE="Prepare" METHOD="SQLPrepare">Select $PARENT AS Stockitem, $CPGODOWN AS godown, $NAME AS Batchname, $MfdOn, $ExpiryPeriod, $$String:$ExpiryPeriod:UniversalDate AS ExpiryDate, $CLOSINGBALANCE, $CLOSINGVALUE * -1 AS CLOSINGVALUE from CPGodownStockColl</SQLREQUEST>
			<STATICVARIABLES>
				<SVEXPORTFORMAT>$$SysName:XML</SVEXPORTFORMAT>
			</STATICVARIABLES>
		</DESC>
	</BODY>
</ENVELOPE>
